title: BD Currency Detection: A CNN-Based Approach with Mobile App Integration
author: Syed Jubayer Jaman (Manarat International University), Md. Zahurul Haque (Manarat International University), Md Robiul Islam (Manarat International University), Usama Abdun Noor (Manarat International University), ...
background: Detecting and classifying Bangladeshi banknotes using a deep learning model integrated into a mobile application for efficient currency recognition.
contribution: This paper introduces a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) for recognizing Bangladeshi banknotes, achieving an accuracy of 98.5%.

technical_comparison.prior_work: Previous methods faced challenges with accuracy under varying conditions and were often not optimized for mobile use.
technical_comparison.novelty: This work improves by optimizing the CNN for real-time performance on mobile devices, converting it to TensorFlow Lite format.

key_innovation: Integrates a highly accurate CNN model for currency recognition into a mobile app that operates offline, utilizing efficient inference through TensorFlow Lite.
real_world_impact: Enhances financial accessibility and security for users, particularly in remote areas with limited internet connectivity, benefiting visually impaired individuals and small businesses.
limitations: No information on potential limitations was explicitly mentioned.

new_terms.TensorFlow Lite: **TensorFlow Lite** is a lightweight version of TensorFlow designed for mobile and embedded devices, allowing neural network models to run efficiently on such platforms.
